/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11 -pthread -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  CMakeFiles/main.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/VideoGrabber.cpp.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/UserControl.cpp.o  -o main  -L/usr/local/cuda/lib  /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudabgsegm.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudaobjdetect.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudastereo.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_shape.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_stitching.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_superres.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videostab.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_viz.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudafeatures2d.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudaoptflow.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudalegacy.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_calib3d.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudawarping.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_features2d.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_flann.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_objdetect.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_highgui.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_ml.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_photo.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudaimgproc.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudafilters.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudaarithm.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_video.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videoio.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgcodecs.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgproc.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_core.3.2.0.dylib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudev.3.2.0.dylib -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/lib
